I wasn't reading the Comments thoroughly, thanks @dknomed! RUN SangFroidSetup.exe in the install folder after extracting
If you're having the black screen problem, you can try setting your resolution to 1280x720, the game doesn't have support for anything higher yet, it fixed it for me.
